text: Brigitte Kronauer (29 December 1940 – 22 July 2019) was a German writer. She was born in Essen, Germany. In 2005, she was awarded the Georg Büchner Prize for her literary works. Kronauer died on 22 July 2019 in Hamburg from a long- illness at the age of 78.Award winning German author Brigitte Kronauer dies at 78 ==References== ==Other websites== * Brigitte Kronauer in: NRW Literatur im Netz Category:Writers from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:People from Essen Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Brigitte Kronauer
